summary: App deployed at https://iasa-challenge-har.caffeine.xyz/. Admin access working. External user (jedvogdt@gmail.com) cannot connect. Fix in progress.
architectural_notes: Admin access is working and must not be modified
External/non-admin user access (e.g. jedvogdt@gmail.com) has a known connection issue being fixed
known_issues: External user (jedvogdt@gmail.com) cannot connect to the app as a non-admin user

existing_features.title: Fix the authentication and connection flow so that external (non-admin) users such as jedvogdt@gmail.com can successfully log in and access the app via Internet Identity at https://iasa-challenge-har.caffeine.xyz/. The issue may stem from error handling or state transitions after login for users who are not administrators. Do NOT alter any admin-related logic, admin access flow, or any other existing app functionality.
